channel.title: Legit-pkz - Release
channel.description:
[center]To All Legit-pkz Players, reason im releasing is because jagex has claimed our site - legit-pkz.com and cba to host anymore. Its been a great run, and i will be looking forward to making another server. EDIT: seems moparscape doesnt support embeds, so just click link. Player Videos:
<iframe title="YouTube video player" class="youtube-player" type="text/html" width="640" height="390" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/0J_B7AXYziw" frameborder="0" allowFullScreen></iframe>
<iframe title="YouTube video player" class="youtube-player" type="text/html" width="640" height="390" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/crf-EFhkKzA" frameborder="0" allowFullScreen></iframe>
<iframe title="YouTube video player" class="youtube-player" type="text/html" width="640" height="390" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/kIvDhPlNCA8" frameborder="0" allowFullScreen></iframe>
<iframe title="YouTube video player" class="youtube-player" type="text/html" width="640" height="390" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/s-eoH7XRN9Y" frameborder="0" allowFullScreen></iframe>
<iframe title="YouTube video player" class="youtube-player" type="text/html" width="480" height="390" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/EY3ndtH54pQ" frameborder="0" allowFullScreen></iframe>
<iframe title="YouTube video player" class="youtube-player" type="text/html" width="480" height="390" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/LDY0KiF7vvU" frameborder="0" allowFullScreen></iframe>
<iframe title="YouTube video player" class="youtube-player" type="text/html" width="480" height="390" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/ALldo2XIsqE" frameborder="0" allowFullScreen></iframe>
This is a really advanced PI source, made from the original PI with all dupes, glitches fixed, [b]POSSIBLEY THE BEST COMBAT SYSTEM AS YOU CAN TELL BY PVP VIDS - COMBAT SYSTEM HAS BEEN REWRITTEN - NO OVERPOWERED ITEMS.[/b]This is as stable as PI can get, i held about 170 at one time.
Features:
100% Hybriding and Switching
Varrock PVP, Just like a PvP World, with safeszones, everything, you can also get pvp drops up on your pk drops, you won’t keep any items here. and you will stay skulled ( Danger skull means you will lose all your items )
* No Lag * 24\7 * Turmoil * Open staff spots! * Can Hold up to 600 Players * All Godswords with Real Special * 100% Duel Arena (Staking,Rules,and ability to disable armor slots) * Training * Amazing hybriding * Autocasting * Barrows * Pest Control * Clan Chat * Skilling * Slayer with Tasks * God Wars * KBD * Dagannoth Kings * Chaos Elemental * Fight Pits * Jad * Obelisks that teleport you around in wild * Split Private Chat * No dupes - Perfect economy * Emotes * Trade with no Bugs * Great Economy * Custom Pvp point shop * Perfect Pking!
hope you guys enjoy this as much as i did.
Server - http://uppit.com/x2m541xqskcg/Legit-pkz_Server.rar Webclient-Ready - http://uppit.com/fir9kd7xqb5x/Legit-pkz_Webclient.rar
Credits 50% Sanity 50% legit-pkz community[/center]

@eyeownyew wrote:

lol i think im gonna give up on trying to get rid of this SQL… i’ve tried getting it of and to get it to work for hours >.>
wish I could get it to work but i guess i wont be using this…

you could just go to the onstartup method and take off the sql connection, thats cheap hack way to get it off

Wow xD I already posted the solution to the SQL (not too in-depth).
[/quote]

you posted a solution to take off the import, taking that off will just cause 100 errors, because you leave alot of variables un-declared.[/quote]
Incorrect. I posted the perfectly correct method of removing SQL. I received 0 errors. I am not a dumbass. Thank you for your time.

Read full topic
